"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5562aded636872098f410200#post_5562aded636872098f410200
I am just asking if someone have reading any new fanfic.
It seems writers are forgetting the Fallout elements and just making fanfic of ponies in a wasteland with futuristic weapons and things.

"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5562aef863687226fac52900#post_5562aef863687226fac52900
Oh, is good.
Well, if you can handle the angst and some edgyness of some fics.

"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5562afc16368724fc0e71000#post_5562afc16368724fc0e71000
Not all the FOE fics are Super Grimdark and Angst like Proyect Horizonts.
There is Fallout Equestria: Pinky Eyes, which is probably the softest fic in the series.
And why the mane 6? 
I think, IMO, have a lot of crossovers of the mane 6 as protagonist, so why not just one where they are just support characters?
